def update_step(params, grads, state, hyperparams):
    lr = hyperparams.get('lr', 0.001)
    momentum_decay = hyperparams.get('momentum_decay', 0.9)
    beta = hyperparams.get('beta', 0.95)
    v_t = beta * state.get('momentum', 0.0) + grads
    state['momentum'] = (1 - momentum_decay) * state.get('momentum', 0.0) + momentum_decay * v_t
    params = params - lr * v_t
    return params, state
